pr_title: [ML] Refactor gathering of context necessary to run datafeed

timeline.message:
[ML] Refactor gathering of context necessary to run datafeed

This groups together the context necessary to build a datafeed
job into a method of the `DatafeedManager`. This method can
be reused in the future in order to determine whether the
job needs to be reverted to its loaded model snapshot in
case the latter is out dated.

timeline.bodyText: nit: seems weird for this to be public when the inner and outer classes are both package private and it's not implementing an interface.
timeline.author: droberts195

timeline.bodyText: This seems like it could be final like the adjacent values
